entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:50 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -33.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 08:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -33.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -37.0°C
Wind: NNE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing late this morning. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 53 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 42 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill minus 58 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the morning then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
